DOC.detailed_description: Mild iodine deficiency still public health issue many industrialized country , especially pregnancy . During last decade monitor iodine status pregnancy Hungary . Since urinary iodine concentration ( UIC ) reflect recent iodine intake carry limited information individual exist iodine store , another biomarker e.g . measurement serum thyroglobulin concentration , would useful gain comprehensive information . In present study , purpose investigation compare UIC , UIC normalize creatinine concentration serum thyroglobulin biomarkers iodine supply pregnant woman geographical region previously iodine deficiency find .
